page.title: 19WEEKENDS 3
page.content: On Friday at 4:00 pm,I come home to the chaos of my sister and brother fighting,so I probably watch T.V.then tell mum that I'm going over to Mark Coles house.Then I go to Marks in blue jeans and a jumper on my BMX.When I get back I have dinner which is always my favourite,baked potatoes in their jackets with tuna.Then I might go back to Marks and have a game of football.Then I go home again and watch TV and then go to bed. On Saturday my brother will be playing He_Man on my bed and I wake up to find him trying to kill me because he thinks I'm Skeletor.At about 11:00 I go down stairs,have breakfast,have a game of snooker then get dressed.Then I might go to the park.Then after lunch I play on my BMX.Sunday is boring because there is not much to do.{By Trevor Butler Age 11
